title: What 4800 IP champion is the FUNNEST to play?
body:
My favorite role is assassin I love diving in and killing people in an instant. I like playing mages also and sometimes ADC. The champs I have in the 4800 ip group our Orianna,MF,Lee Sin,Wukong,Vladmir,Talon,Nocturn,Malz,Kennen,Fizz and Ezreal. I don't mind jungling either.

I'm looking for a champ that is fun to play not op. I am thinking of buying Brand,Cassiopeia or caitlyn (maybe vayne). I don't know who to buy.

replies.body:
From what you called out, I'd say look at:

{{champion:92}} (lots of combos, capable of diving and killing)
{{champion:59}} (super flexible between damage and tank, and I think he's really fun)
{{champion:103}} (mage/assassin, pretty fun and flashy to play)
{{champion:67}} (kind of an ADC/assassin hybrid - pretty fun if you like mechanically intense champs)
Riven hands down. I'll admit she isn't fun to play against, but you'd be hard pressed to find a champ funner to play than Riven, at least in my opinion as a fighting game player.
Dammit xD I bought cassiopeia since she looked like a lane bully but now really want riven haha. I'm gonna buy her next thanks guys :P

brand is crazy fun in urf but is kind of mixed bag normally he is fun, however in midlane he is outclassed by a few champs and as support if your jungler and adc are not competant you will be screwing them over sometimes.

{{champion:83}}
